channel.title: Need help with original marix server
channel.description:
I have two problems; running the source and running the server... when I run the source, it gives me an error with starting the java.dll or some crap, but I do have jdk 7 update 5 installed, so i dont get it?
And as for the cache, it gives me a "main" cache file error, as if I dont have the cache in it, but I actually checkedand removedand applied the cache 5 times. Any help?
This is the "Matrix" server that dragonkk posted himself in the moparscape forums...many other people are having this issue...can anyone help?

item.title: Need help with original marix server

I have two problems; running the source and running the server… when I run the source, it gives me an error with starting the java.dll or some crap, but I do have jdk 7 update 5 installed, so i dont get it?
